title: 2013/60/EU: Council Decision of 22 January 2013 appointing two Austrian alternate members of the Committee of the Regions
header:
25.1.2013 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 22/22
COUNCIL DECISION
of 22 January 2013
appointing two Austrian alternate members of the Committee of the Regions
(2013/60/EU)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union, and in particular Article 305 thereof,
Having regard to the proposals from the Austrian Government,
Whereas:
(1) On 22 December 2009 and on 18 January 2010, the Council adopted Decisions 2009/1014/EU (1) and 2010/29/EU (2) appointing the members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions for the period from 26 January 2010 to 25 January 2015.
(2) Two alternate members’ seats on the Committee of the Regions have become vacant following the end of the terms of office of Mr Achill RUMPOLD and Ms Bernadette MENNEL,
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed to the Committee of the Regions as alternate members for the remainder of the current term of office, which runs until 25 January 2015:
— Mr Wolfgang WALDNER, Landesrat beim Amt der Kärntner Landesregierung,
— Dr Gabriele NUSSΒAUMER, Landtagspräsidentin.
This Decision shall enter into force on the day of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 January 2013.
For the Council
The President
M. NOONAN
(1)  OJ L 348, 29.12.2009, p. 22.
(2)  OJ L 12, 19.1.2010, p. 11.
